messages.subject: re: withdrawing.. otherwise known as "new start"
messages.msgSnippet: I actually will have less of a problem with babysitting during the weekend. The woman who will be taking care of them works part time during the week, so is
messages.messageBody:
I actually will have less of a problem with babysitting during the
weekend. The woman who will be taking care of them works part time
during the week, so is mostly home every weekend. I will be taking
her children during the week while she works. When I said I was
worried about it being hard on them spending time with her, then time
with me.. I was worried at the time about the kids switching back and
forth between projects, but we have talked more, and she usually does
mostly art projects during the weekend.. and if they're in the middle
of something here and don't want to have to wait to finish, i'll
simply take it to her. It's actually funny. They've only been out of
school 2 days, and I already see a difference in my son. He made
everyone breakfast in bed this morning.... this child who usually
wouldn't get up to get his own bowl of cereal or pop-tart... and he
has drawn me 4 pictures this morning, and all included hearts and
flowery sayings. I haven't seen him this relaxed and affectionate in
a year or more. I should have done this sooner.
Jennifer
